#summary Adding Tyck-Till examples.

= No jQuery on page =

  * Use tycktill-loader.js to load all needed dependencies:

<code language="html">
<script src="http://tycktill.vgregion.se/tyck-till/tycktill/resources/js/tycktill-loader.js" type="text/javascript" language="javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
</code>

  * Add a link/button/element with the class="tycktill" to the page:

<code language="html">
<a href="{http://path/to/local_page}" data-url="http://tycktill.vgregion.se/tyck-till/tycktill/KontaktaOss" data-form="{tycktill-form-name}" title="{Dialog title}">Tyck till!</a>
</code>


= jQuery on page =
